docsPageDesc: Documentation page. Read through it to understand how ilemandatow works. Learn more how seats distribution is calculated with D'Hondt method.
electionSettingsDescription: Provide election settings such as threshold and number of seats in the parliament.
heroTitle: It's a free, open-source platform which main purpose is to gather and share results of election polls to the Sejm of the Republic of Poland
indexPageDesc: Ilemandatow is a service that lets user browse and filter polls results to the Sejm of the Republic of Poland. Simulate election results and seats distribution.
indexPageTitle: Ilemandatow - browse polls results in one place
moreInfoHeroDesc: Learn more about us on docs page
newPollFormPageDesc: Simulate election results and seats distribution in the Sejm of the Republic of Poland.
newPollHeroDesc: Simulate seats distribution in the future Parliament
newPollVizPageDesc: Visualize and edit results of simulated election.
openSourceHeroDesc: Source code is available on GitHub
pollPageDesc: Check out latest poll registered by ilemandatow.
pollResultsTableDescription: Each table row corresponds to one party. Provide party name, poll result in %, and color that will be used on the charts.
pollsExplainedDesc: We gather poll results from multiple sources and we publish them here so that everyone has an easy access. We do our best to keep our archives up to date. You can browse and search polls via our search feature.
pollsHeroDesc: Browse and filter polls results in one place
pollsPageDesc: Filter and browse polls results to the Sejm of the Republic of Poland.
privacyPageDesc: Read through privacy settings of ilemandatow.
quickExampleDesc: Check out seats distribution in the future Parliament based on election results. Below you can find seats distribution based on latest poll registered by our service.
